source: MCP Finance (get_customer_ltv) + Sales MCP pipeline data

territories.name: Mid-Atlantic
territories.character: Abbott-driven explosive growth, fastest in region

territories.name: NJ Pharma Corridor
territories.character: Big Pharma anchors, mixed margins, strong pipeline

territories.name: Genetown
territories.character: High-margin managed services, Takeda margin drag
risks: Takeda at 14.5% GP drags blended margin

territories.name: Research Triangle
territories.character: GREENFIELD — Zero revenue, massive CDMO/CRO opportunity
risks: Zero penetration in major life sciences hub

Mid-Atlantic.rationale: Abbott at $1.94M needs dedicated attention + expansion across divisions
Mid-Atlantic.expectedOutcome: Grow Abbott to $2.5M+, add 3 new logos

NJ Pharma.rationale: Highest win rate (74.8%) on highest-value targets (Regeneron, J&J, Bausch)
NJ Pharma.expectedOutcome: Expand Regeneron, save J&J/Integra, new Merck/BMS logos

Genetown.rationale: Dense territory with 18 accounts needing managed services focus
Genetown.expectedOutcome: Takeda margin recovery, Moderna expansion, 5+ new logos

Research Triangle.rationale: Greenfield territory needs investment before dedicated seller

terminology.territory: Geographic zone grouping accounts by regional life sciences ecosystem
terminology.bookings: Won opportunity amount (contract value at close)
terminology.egp: Estimated Gross Profit (projected margin at booking)
terminology.gp: Actual Gross Profit (realized margin after delivery)
